title: Advisory: Vice President Biden to Speak at Legal Symposium Celebrating the 15th Anniversary of the Violence Against Women Act | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House




April 21, 2009

 



Advisory: Vice President Biden to Speak at Legal Symposium Celebrating the 15th Anniversary of the Violence Against Women Act




THE WHITE HOUSE   Office of the Vice President  __________________________________________________________________  FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE                                       April 21st, 2009  VICE PRESIDENT BIDEN TO SPEAK AT LEGAL SYMPOSIUM CELEBRATING THE 15th ANNIVERSARY OF THE VIOLENCE AGAINST WOMEN ACT  Will Receive Award for Championing Violence Against Women Act  Tomorrow, Wednesday April 22nd, at approximately 11 AM Vice President Biden will attend a Symposium celebrating the 15th Anniversary of the Violence Against Women Act (VAWA) at Georgetown University Law Center. The Vice President will be presented with The Legal Momentum Hero Award for initiating and championing the Violence Against Women Act. The Vice President will give remarks. This event is OPEN PRESS but RSVP is required. For more information, please contact the Georgetown University Law Center: mediarelations@law.georgetown.edu or (202) 662-9500.   Georgetown University Law Center  McDonough Hall – Hart Auditorium  600 New Jersey Avenue, NW  Washington, DC 20001
